text: Leone Frollo (9 April 1931 â€“ 17 October 2018) was an Italian comic book artist. He was known for his work in Biancaneve. He was also known for his works in Lucifera and Yra. He was born in Venice. Frollo died on 17 October 2018 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian comics artists Category:People from Venice
title: Leone Frollo
